location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Yezd to the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is likely to be from the Company's agent in Yezd who was responsible for buying and selling in the Company's interests and would probably have been Armenian.Note that the letter was receivedon 31 January 1767 so is likely to have been written in early January 1767.The letter concerns the purchase of wool in the region and mentions the troubles in Carmenia [KirmƒÅn Province] that are obstructing this trade.
